entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
